# findPanelSubstringMatch

**Type Property**

A number object containing the match type to use in the find panel.

## Declaration

```swift
static let findPanelSubstringMatch: NSPasteboard.PasteboardType.FindPanelSearchOptionKey
```

## Discussion

The value of this key is an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSNumber] object containing one of the values defined in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSFindPanelSubstringMatchType].

## Constants

- **findPanelSearchOptions**: Type for the find panel metadata property list.
- **findPanelCaseInsensitiveSearch**: A Boolean value indicating whether the search is case-insensitive.
